info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 8:34PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Bladen, central Brunswick and northeastern Columbus Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 834 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Makatoka, or 12 miles north of Shallotte, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leland, Lake Waccamaw, Northwest, Sandyfield, Makatoka, Hallsboro, Honey Island, Redbug, Exum, Council, Batarora, Freeman, Phoenix, Delco, Riegelwood, Crusoe Island, Navassa, Bolton, East Arcadia and Sandy Creek. This includes US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 16 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
